analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/41/0xc7a2085d9217b5ccbed5f91b0a02de3a8e881eb3.sol:
	Contract Marcelo has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xc7a2085d9217b5ccbed5f91b0a02de3a8e881eb3.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

MultiTransfer.multiTransfer (/unique_chucks/41/0xc7a2085d9217b5ccbed5f91b0a02de3a8e881eb3.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_addresses[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/41/0xc7a2085d9217b5ccbed5f91b0a02de3a8e881eb3.sol)

MultiTransfer.multiTransfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_addresses[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/41/0xc7a2085d9217b5ccbed5f91b0a02de3a8e881eb3.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/41/0xc7a2085d9217b5ccbed5f91b0a02de3a8e881eb3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/41/0xc7a2085d9217b5ccbed5f91b0a02de3a8e881eb3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/41/0xc7a2085d9217b5ccbed5f91b0a02de3a8e881eb3.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addresses' of MultiTransfer.multiTransfer (/unique_chucks/41/0xc7a2085d9217b5ccbed5f91b0a02de3a8e881eb3.sol) is not in mixedCase
